text: Agar Allah inke darmiyan tumhein wapas le jaye aur aainda in mein se koi giroh jihad ke liye nikalne ki tumse ijazat maange to saaf keh dena, “ ab tum mere saath hargiz nahin chal sakte aur na meri maaiyat (company) mein kisi dushman se ladd sakte ho, tumne pehle baith rehne ko pasand kiya tha ab ghar baithne walon hi ke saath baithey raho”
